modName: Forsworn Loincloth for Sundracon and Favored Soul Males
descriptionHtml:
Now you too can revel in the freedom of less binding furs around your privates, while still maintaining a farcical pretense of modesty! No more skulls bouncing off your nut sack as you jog down the tundra! Get a tan while spitting in the face of progress. Bring back the old ways!

Dry clean only.

Requires Sundracon's or Favored Soul's meshes from Better Males mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

UPDATE - Version 2:

* Now Sundracon only, (Favored Soul still available in version 1)
* No longer a replacer, and is craftable at the forge, under "Misc".
* Can craft with cape or without
* Better fit -- can't really see it in the screen shots, but the new version is more form-fitting, and has a more natural bulge
* Better animation -- no longer swings like stiff cardboard
* Some minor lighting and poke-through artifacts :(
author: Seedye

Better fitting, with appropriate bulge in front
No blood splatter strangeness
